title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2014 - Zurich, Switzerland
description:
For the third time, Zurich is a GO for GDCR! 
Our hosts, as per tradition, are the friendliest and coolest IT shop in town: Namics AG (http://www.namics.com/namics/standorte/zuerich/). 
Fun times ahead! Can't wait? Want to be sure not to miss out? 
Wer're open for registrations at Coders Only | Zurich (http://zurich.codersonly.org/events/code-retreat/).
